property.value: {MUGEN CLIMB} Water/Darkness 4(You may summon this creature from your hand or graveyard by tapping 4 of your creatures and paying Water/Darkness 4.) {INFINITY BREAKER} {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Ignore the abilities of creatures that cost 5 or less and the effects of spells that cost 5 or less.

property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ At the end of each of your turns, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.
